title: Infinix Hot 11 (Emerald Green, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adaptor, USB Type-C Cable, TPU Case, Protective Screen Guard, SIM Ejector Pin, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Dual Speakers with DTS Surround Sound
product_specification.Display Type: Full HD+ LCD IPS In-cell Display
product_specification.Other Display Features: 20:9 Aspect Ratio, 500 NITS Brightness, 90.66% Screen-to-body Ratio, 1500:1 Contrast Ratio, Eye Care Mode
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: AI Dual Camera: 13MP (f/1.8) + Depth Lens, Quad LED Flash, Modes: Super Night, Custom Portrait, AI HDR, AI 3D Beauty, Panorama, Document, AR Shots, Slo-mo Video, Time Lapse, Short Video, 2K Video Recording with Bokeh
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 8MP AI Front Camera (f/2.0) Dual LED Flash, Modes: Super Night, AI Portrait, AI 3D Face Beauty, WideSelfie, AR Shots, Time Lapse, 2K Video Recording with Bokeh
product_specification.Flash: Rear - Quad LED Flash | Front - Dual LED Flash
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, G-Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Gyroscope, E-Compass
product_specification.Other Features: DAR-LINK Game Boost Technology, Power Marathon Tech, Video Assistant, Thunderback, Xhide, Theft Alert, Peek Proof, Kids Mode, Xclone, Photo Compressor, 360 Flashlight, Social Turbo, Wi-Fi Share, Smart Gestures, Digital Wellbeing, Dark Theme, Eye Care, Multi-Window, Bike Mode, Game Mode, Smart Panel, AI Gallery
product_specification.Audio Formats: AAC, AAC+, AAC+ Enhanced, OGG Vorbis, WAV, MP3, Midi
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.16.76 cm (6.6) FHD+ High-res Display: The Infinix Hot 11 has a 16.76 cm (6.6) FHD+ display with a Drop Notch screen that offers a 20:9 aspect ratio and a 90.6% screen-to-body ratio. Thus, it offers an edge-to-edge, uninterrupted viewing experience. Also, the 500 NITS brightness and 1500:1 contrast ratio offer bright and clear visuals.
product_description.Helio G70 Octa-core Processor: The Helio G70 Octa-core processor along with 12nm FinFET, 2.0GHz CPU frequency offers a seamless mobile computing experience. Also, for screen-tearing and stuttering-free gaming, this smartphone has Mediatek Hyper Engine Gaming Technology and DAR-LINK Game Boost Technology. To enhance your gaming performance, it has a responsive touch panel, improved colour reproduction, and low heating for hours of gaming. To expand the memory capacity for up to 256 GB, it has a 3-in-1 card slot.
product_description.5200 mAh Battery: The 5200 mAh battery offers hours of non-stop performance, and the Power Marathon Tech enhances the battery backup by up to 25%. Thus, this smartphone offers up to 27 hours of video playback time, up to 182 hours of music playback time on headsets, up to 52 hours of 4G talktime, up to 17 hours of web surfing time, and up to 64 days of standby time with a single charge. Also, to charge this device, you receive a 10W charger and a Type C cable.
product_description.13 MP AI Dual Rear Camera: The 13 MP AI Dual Rear camera with an f1.8 aperture, a depth lens, and a Quad-LED flash lets you click clear and beautiful images. You can also capture Super Slow-motion and Time-lapse videos. This camera also features the Bokeh mode, Super Night mode, Short Video mode, Document mode, and capability to capture 2K high-res videos.
product_description.8 MP selfie with Dual-LED Flash: The Infinix Hot 11 is equipped with an 8 MP AI selfie camera having an f/2.0 aperture and a dedicated Dual LED flash to click stunning selfies. To further enhance the quality of your selfies, this camera has AI Portrait, Super Night Mode, WideSelfie, and 3D Face Beauty Mode among other features. You can also shoot 2K high-res videos using this selfie camera.
product_description.Dual Speakers with DTS: The cinematic dual speakers and DTS Surround sound offer an immersive audio experience.
product_description.Design to Impress: The wave flow pattern at this smartphone’s back offers a sleek exterior, and the rectangular camera module lens adds elegance to this device.
product_description.Fingerprint and Face Unlock: The multi-functional fingerprint sensor can unlock the phone, dismiss an alarm, and even accept calls. By syncing your favourite apps with different fingers, you can jumpstart these apps. Also, you can use the Face Unlock feature to unlock this phone.
product_description.XOS 7.6 on Android 11: Powered by Android 11 OS, the XOS 7.6 offers a plethora of exciting features, such as Theft Alert, Thunderback, Secure Card, Video Assistant, Wi-Fi share, Xhide, Xclone, Game Zone, Kids Mode, Smart Gestures, Photo Compressor, Smart Panel, Photo Compressor, Social Turbo, 360 Flashlight, and Peek Proof among others.

review:
Nice phone I suggest this phone I like this phone
Camera - Nice camera , front single flash light, full hd screen , DTS sound and type c charger according all features in this price the phone make unique.

Hugh improvement this price segment All Smartphones brand also improve this price segment Well don Infinix you are Growing day by day Very nice smartphone big Pros 🥰 Full hd display, Prosser, dual Stero speakers, big battery, USB type C Charger, Display very bright. Cons😂 Software improvement, Secondary Mice, Vildqialitey.

Mention Review after 3 months
Note: ((((No inbuilt company call recording (initially infinix provides call recording features ,but they removed it very disappointed ,it has Google dialer which tells others when call recording start))))
Camera : decent for regular usage , needs improvement 3/5
Performance: decent for regular usage 3/5
Battery : normal don't perform like 5200 mah seems like 4000 mah 3/5
Storage : , can be more optimize 3/5
Looks : very good 5/5
Display: very good 5/5
Build quality : good 4/5
Sound quality :good 4/5
Charging : normal speed 3/5 (should have given fast charger)

Overall decent smartphone

Rooms for improvement
1) ui should be stock Android, many useless bloatware are install which can't be uninstall.
2) upcoming Android software update must be free from bugs like network issue, charging issue, battery issue, performance issue. Because After update mobile become slow day by day.
3) accessories like charger and cable are cheap, not durable.
4) mobile should be long lasting and durable.


Will update after 6 months
Because real review of mobile comes after use of 6 months.

Good product

👌👌📱




🥰I am very happy 🥰

Good choice. Few things from which I was dissatisfied was that company didn't gave fast charging in the box as well as didn't mentioned on the box that how much watts of fast charging it supports. Quality of charging cable is okay not like realme, Xiaomi, etc. But yes it does give DTS Sound, Type C charging and FHD screen in this price. If you're Binger and constrained to budget of 10K then go for it.

Very good phone

Display is FHD in 10k. It is best as no one is giving FHD in 10k even bigger brands.
Dual speakers are good and loud.
Processor is Mtk helio G70 and is almost matching Mtk helio G85. The performance is not only on paper but can be seen in real as usage is smooth & lag free. Games are also payable but not a Gaming phone.
Battery is good. 100% can last around 8-10 hrs Screen on time.
Charging takes around 2.5 hrs no complaints as battery is big & normal charging speed of 10w.
Camera is good but can be improved via software updates.

Overall Best package for a good budget smartphone for anyone who need phone under Rs 10,000/-

P.S. - There are ads & bloatwares which can be removed.
My review is after removing those ads & bloatwares.
